column4: I downloaded a .mov file, and mplayer says that I don't have the necessary decoder. Where do I find it?
Where do I get the .mov decoder?
How do i play quicktime movies on my computer?
How should it install something? It just names a file.
just copy and paste it, it runs a script which installs it
I even tried just typing that line, and it didn't work.
did you do the commands above that first?
Thanks. I just left out the "examples" part.
you can highlight text and then click with the mouse wheel to paste, just an fyi, cool linux thing
